name: Titanium.Android.Intent
summary: Message objects passed between Android application components.

methods.name: addFlags
methods.summary: Adds to the existing flags on the Intent.
methods.description: The specified flag are combined with the existing flags using a bitwise OR.

parameters.name: flags
parameters.summary: Bitwise OR of the flags to add to the existing set.

methods.name: getBooleanExtra
methods.summary: Get a boolean property from this Intent.

parameters.name: default
parameters.summary: Default value to return if property does not exist or is of a different type.

parameters.name: default
parameters.summary: Default value to return if property does not exist or is of a different type.

parameters.name: default
parameters.summary: Default value to return if property does not exist or is of a different type.

parameters.name: default
parameters.summary: Default value to return if property does not exist or is of a different type.

methods.name: getStringExtra
methods.description:
Can also be used to get the string representation of a property that's stored as an Android Parcel, such as a URI.

Titanium does not support getParcelableExtra due to the inability to translate all of its possible return types to JavaScript.

See also: [getParcelableExtra](https://developer.android.com/reference/android/content/Intent.html#getParcelableExtra(java.lang.String) in the Android Developer Reference.

methods.name: hasExtra
methods.summary: Returns true if this Intent has the specified property.

methods.name: putExtraUri
methods.summary: Put a URI property on this Intent (useful for EXTRA_STREAM).

parameters.name: value
parameters.summary: The URI, as a string or a string array.

properties.name: action
properties.description: Specify one of the ACTION constants from Titanium.Android, or an application-specific custom action string.

properties.name: className
properties.summary: The Java class name of the activity associated with this intent (packageName must also be set).

properties.name: data
properties.description:
The data URI can be set when the intent is created. It is read-only after the intent is created.

For more information on data URIs, see: Intent.setData in the Android API Reference

properties.name: packageName
properties.summary: The fully-qualified Java package name of the activity.

properties.name: type
properties.description:
The MIME type can be set when the intent is created. It is read-only after the intent is created.

For information on MIME types and intents, see: Intent.setType in the Android API Reference.

properties.name: url
properties.summary: The URL to a Titanium JavaScript Activity.
